session_summary: NFL Prediction System Enhancement - Consistency Fix, Football Intelligence, Insider Tracking, Automation
key_achievements: Fixed critical prediction inconsistency (player stats vs team scores)
Created automated data gathering with cron jobs

nfl_prediction_consistency.problem: Player statistics generated independently from team scores
nfl_prediction_consistency.solution: Derive player stats FROM team scores using formula: (TDs × 6) + (XPs × 1) + (FGs × 3)
nfl_prediction_consistency.impact: Eliminates impossible scenarios, ensures mathematical consistency

football_intelligence_requirement.insight: Quantum metrics alone insufficient - need deep football understanding
components: Contextual intelligence (injuries, practice reports, social media)

tracking: Backup QBs know play calls, hand signals (1-2 point edge)
Coaches know entire systems (3-5 point edge)
Practice squad players know routes, timing (0.5-1 point edge)

betting_line_shading.insight: Public money shades lines 1-3 points, creating value opportunities
factors: Popular teams (Cowboys, Packers) get 1-1.5 point shading
Travel factor: Road teams get 2-3 extra points

automation_requirement.insight: System must run autonomously without user interaction
implementation: Real NFL.com scraper working (94 transactions found)

next_steps: Enhance scraper to extract player positions
Add real API integrations (The Odds API, Twitter API)
